TooltipType.Name: ACCOUNT
TooltipType.Header: All Your Cool Stuff and Excellent Progress
TooltipType.Text: See your levels, achievements, and stats. Manage inventory, watch replays, and more.

TooltipType.Name: STORE
TooltipType.Header: Browse Custom Skins, Taunts, and More
TooltipType.Text: You will look good. New shipments arrive all the time. Sorry, no pay to win items.

TooltipType.Name: MISSIONS
TooltipType.Header: Earn Bonus Gold For Completing These Missions
TooltipType.Text: Every week you'll get new missions that reward you for exploring new legends and playstyles.

TooltipType.Name: SOCIAL
TooltipType.Text: All your Steam friends who play Brawlhalla are here. Chat, spectate, team-up, join a game room, and more.

TooltipType.Name: OPTIONS
TooltipType.Text: Customize your controller or your keyboard controls. Also set volume, full-screen, and more.

TooltipType.Name: COUCHPARTY
TooltipType.Header: Play Offline with up to Four Controllers
TooltipType.Text: Tips: Hit 'Brawlers' in the upper left to set teams and bots. Hit the 'Settings' Button to set game modes.

TooltipType.Name: SINGLEPLAYER
TooltipType.Text: Go for a personal high score in the Tournament or check out the advanced tools in the Training Room.

TooltipType.Name: ONLINEFFA
TooltipType.Text: Jump into a 1v1 strikeout or four-player, free-for-all brawl. And stay classy in the chat.

TooltipType.Name: CUSTOMONLINE
TooltipType.Header: Create or Join an Online Game Room
TooltipType.Text: Play, spectate, and hang out. Create a game room and share the room number with your friends.

TooltipType.Name: RANKED1V1
TooltipType.Text: Not for Beginners. Win with grace, lose with class. Have fun. It's a long way to the top.

TooltipType.Name: BUGREPORT
TooltipType.Text: Thanks! We're in beta and adding features all the time, so we really appreciate your bug reports.

TooltipType.Name: LORE
TooltipType.Header: Each Legend is Legendary For a Reason
TooltipType.Text: Learn a bit about each legend's life before a Valkyrie offered them a place in Brawlhalla.

TooltipType.Name: NEWSPAGE
TooltipType.Text: Also, check out the Brawlhalla Community Hub on Steam for full patch notes, tournament info, discussion, and more.
